name: Harry Game
description:
i put myself in a not very good 3D platformer because I have a serious problem with my ego

plot: i am on holiday in the most horrible place fathomable by man - england - and need to get to the hotel so i can ask for directions to leave england. unfortunately the hotel is only accessible via a street designed exclusively for the use of parkour lads

controls:

wasd: move
space: jump
mouse: camera
hotel: trivago
